sn1.22:4.1: “It doesn’t impact a person who doesn’t impact others.
sn1.22:4.2: It impacts a person because they impact others.
sn1.22:4.3: That’s why it impacts someone who impacts:
sn1.22:4.4: the one who wrongs one who’s done no wrong.”
sn1.22:5.1: “Whoever wrongs a man who’s done no wrong,
sn1.22:5.2: a pure man with a spotless record,
sn1.22:5.3: the evil backfires back on the fool,
